amendment.description: Amendment to allow for a possible fourth and fifth suspension of the mandatory purchase for certain communities that are making adequate progress in construction of their flood protection systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-138 to allow for a possible fourth and five year suspension of the mandatory purchase for certain communities that are making more than adequate progress in their construction of their flood protection systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schock.
